item.title: Mitt Humiliates The Media and Now They Will Seek Revenge
item.description: Mitt Humiliates The Media and Now They Will Seek Revenge http://t.co/VDDMDxUl via @BreitbartNews
item.content:encoded: Mitt Humiliates The Media and Now They Will Seek Revenge http://t.co/VDDMDxUl via @BreitbartNews Even though Obama enjoyed four more minutes to speak than Romney, immediately after last night's debate, the left marched in unison to blame the moderator for not controlling things enough. And this makes perfect sense. Leftists know they can't win on a level playing field. But if the referee takes control, victory can be had! Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: breitbart.com
